infotexts.entitydescription.fabricatorVGM: An old-style Self-assembling Fababricator™ once commonly seen everywhere. While no longer suitable for producing most products, it can be modified to provide weapon attachments. Of course, it still needs power.Use a crowbar to dismantle, long press the right button and then press “E” to place.
infotexts.entitydescription.flashHiderMuzzleVGM: Effectively reduces recoil during sustained fire and provides a slight damage boost. Typically the first choice for automatic weapons, compatible with most firearms in various calibers.
infotexts.entitydescription.longBarrelMuzzleVGM: Increases muzzle velocity, enhancing damage and armor-piercing capabilities. Not suitable for compact weapons. Note: Excessively long barrels aren't ideal for close-quarters combat.
infotexts.entitydescription.longSilencerMuzzleVGM: This suppressor made with alien materials reduces firing noise while significantly increasing muzzle velocity for notable damage improvement. Not suitable for compact weapons.
infotexts.entitydescription.shortSilencerMuzzleVGM: Basic suppressor that reduces firing noise while providing slight damage boost and some recoil reduction. Compatible with most weapons.
infotexts.entitydescription.lightStockVGM: The primary stock for assault rifles, moderately reduces aim spread.
infotexts.entitydescription.heavyStockVGM: The primary stock for HMGs, significantly reduces aim spread at the cost of mobility.
infotexts.entitydescription.sniperStockVGM: An ergonomic sniper stock that minimizes aim spread but severely impacts weapon mobility.
infotexts.entitydescription.pistolStockVGM: A compact stock designed for revolvers and machine pistols that effectively reduces aim spread but affects mobility when carrying the weapon.
infotexts.entitydescription.acogScopeVGM: Some designs never go out of style, even in the space colonization era. Effectively extends weapon visibility range.
infotexts.entitydescription.sniperScopeVGM: 8x sniper scope that maximally extends weapon visibility range. Not suitable for compact weapons. Note: Excessive magnification affects close-quarters performance.
infotexts.entitydescription.verticalGripVGM: Helps maintain tactical stance for extended periods, reducing weapon raise time.
infotexts.entitydescription.angleGripVGM: Helps maintain muzzle-up tactical stance for extended periods, reducing weapon raise time.
infotexts.entitydescription.tacHandCannonVGM: Large-caliber hand cannons deserve sniper scopes. No one made this a rule, but everyone loves doing it.
infotexts.entitydescription.tacShotgunVGM: All 42 attempts to saw off its barrel ended in failure.
infotexts.entitydescription.tacKnifeVGM: You don't know why you'd add tactical attachments to a knife, but you did it anyway. Maybe now you can call yourself "Colonel 100"?
infotexts.entitydescription.tacMachinePistolVGM: Even Europa's OGs need tactical style.
infotexts.entitydescription.tacRevolverVGM: Its exceptionally sturdy construction allows mounting some rifle attachments.
infotexts.entitydescription.tacSmgVGM: The weapon most divers use for a lifetime.
infotexts.entitydescription.tacDeadEyeVGM: DeadEye rifles are already hard to find, and one that can mount attachments is even rarer. Take good care of her.
infotexts.entitydescription.tacHmgVGM: Better add a stock unless you plan to cosplay as a Space Marine or actually have Space Marine-level physique.
